Ezreal is the reason why we cant have nice sheen things :c

Not completely true, the reson we can't have nice sheen items is that riot's fixed on making every sheen upgrade work for both ranged AND melee. Every item that can work on both ranged and melee has to be in a state where it's weak for both of them since if it's good on melee, ranged will have the same benefits but can abuse theyr range, but if it's bad on melee, ranged can't use it since that means the item is just that bad or at least only ranged can use it since they are ranged and have an innate advantage. They should really start to make more Melee/Ranged only items since this would help with the game balance in a lot of ways since the items would be balanced only around either one OR the other, making so that if it's good on one class it's bad on the other, this way no champ would be extremely buffed/nerfed indirectly because somene else can abuse a core item.
But yeah, as long as riot is fixed on making items that every champ can use Ezreal will always abuse them and the item will be nerfed untill it's only good on him making it ba on every other champ.

The reason why Ezreal breaks Sheen items specifically is his Q applying on-hit effects instead of spell effects AND being spammable. Most ADCs don't have a spam spell and therefore don't get that much out of Sheen; Ezreal does and can. Any Sheen effect just becomes a direct buff/modification to his Q.

To put it in perspective, think about what Evelyn or Urgot would be like if their Q's proc'ed on-hit effects. Just think about it.

Well ez is not the only one who can easily spam a ranged skill, it might be weaker than his q, but every ranged champion with a remotely spammable skill can break a sheen. That said, if Iceborn was melee only ezreal wouldn't be able to break it, and that's what I mean. Also Iceborn is not the only item which is in a bad and undesirable state because a ranged champ can break it. The best example is Sterak's, but we also have BoTRK, frozen mallet (ever played against a lucian with frozen mallet? Try to catch him and if you manage to, try to kill him). We are talking about ez so I will stick with him, but really the problem is not ez's q, it's the item beying both melee and ranged.
My post might've ben a bit misleading but that's just about it, if items where designed to work on only melee or ranged champs, the game would be a lot easier to balance and it would be incredibly hard for a champ to break an item since the item would be designed with that fact in mind.
